pageNotFound.errorMessage: It looks like it got lost in translation. We could not find the page you were looking for.
pageNotFound.title: Page Not Found

essential.label: Essential Cookies

functional.label: Functional Cookies

header.description: We know, cookies aren't everyone's favorite snack, but they help me (the website's developer) give you the smoothest, bug-free experience possible. Just a few crumbs can make all the difference!
header.subTitle: Yep, it's another one of *those* banners...
header.title: Cookies, Anyone?

statistics.description: We need to save some technical cookies, for the website to function properly.
statistics.label: Statistics

automaticKeyExtraction.introduction: Instantly extract translation keys from your code files whenever you save. i18nWeave uses smart detection of code changes, ensuring scans only happen when necessary.

automaticTranslation.introduction: Automatically translate missing keys in all defined languages whenever you add a translation to a resource file. i18nWeave currently supports translation with DeepL (in beta), with plans to add Google Translate soon.
automaticTranslation.limitations: <0>Limitations:</0> The DeepL integration in i18nWeave supports the languages listed here: <1>DeepL Documentation</1>.

introduction.description: Manage your translations with ease using the i18nWeave VSCode extension. i18nWeave provides a wide range of features to help you manage your translations and keep your translations in sync with your codebase.

tableView.introduction: Manage your translations easily with the interactive table view. No more endless scrolling through JSON files—find untranslated keys at the top of the table for quick access.

configurationWizard.introduction: After installing the VSCode extension, you’ll be up and running in no time with the Configuration Wizard.

configureProject.description: Open the command palette and run the <0>`Configure i18nWeave`</0> command. Follow the instructions to set up your project. To open the command palette, press <1>Ctrl+Shift+P</1> on Windows/Linux or <2>Cmd+Shift+P</2> on macOS.
configureProject.title: Configure Your Project

examples.introduction: If you’re not yet using i18next, don’t worry! I’ve created sample applications showcasing different approaches to help you get started.

installExtension.description: Search for the i18nWeave extension in the Visual Studio Code extensions window or visit the
installExtension.title: Install the Extension

librarySupport.introduction: i18nWeave supports a wide variety of projects, frameworks, and libraries. As long as you're using i18next for your translations, i18nWeave can be your go-to tool.

404.description: Automatically scan your code and extract translation keys into i18next files. The i18nWeave VS Code extension syncs translations with your codebase.
404.keywords: i18next, VS Code extension, scan code, extract translation keys
404.title: Page Not Found

features.description: Discover i18nWeave's key features: automatic key extraction, smart translation with DeepL, and an interactive table for seamless translation management.
features.keywords: i18nWeave, i18next, VS Code extension, translation keys, automatic translation, DeepL, translation management, interactive table, localization tools
features.title: Features

gettingStarted.description: Learn how to install and configure the i18nWeave VS Code extension to scan your code and extract translation keys into i18next files.
gettingStarted.keywords: i18nWeave, i18next, VS Code extension, extract translation keys, configure i18nWeave, localization, translation sync
gettingStarted.title: Getting Started

home.description: Automatically scan your code and extract translation keys into i18next files. The i18nWeave VS Code extension syncs translations with your codebase.
home.keywords: i18next, VS Code extension, scan code, extract translation keys
home.title: Developer's i18next Companion
